definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
Lake Ontario, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]

sentences.english: It's not like we're back in Ontario, how's that?
sentences.chinese: 这不像是回到了安大略湖，怎么会？

sentences.english: For 26 years, I worked for a major corporation in Toronto, Ontario.
sentences.chinese: 我在安大略省多伦多市一家大公司工作了二十六年。

sentences.english: Trade certification for automotive machinists is available, but voluntary, in Ontario.
sentences.chinese: 在安大略省汽车机械师行业认证可用，但是自愿的，。

sentences.english: LCBO stores are generally the only stores allowed to sell hard liquor in Ontario.
sentences.chinese: LCBO商店是安大略省唯一允许卖烈性酒的地方。

sentences.english: This is the website for Department of Medicine, University of Western Ontario .
sentences.chinese: 这是西安大略大学医学系的网站。

sentences.english: Moonlite Bay Camp Lake of the Woods, Ontario Canada Fishing Lodge.
sentences.chinese: 月光湾湖营地的树林中，加拿大安大略省渔业投宿。

sentences.english: University Health Network-Princess Margaret Hospital, Toronto, Ontario.
sentences.chinese: 大学健康网络玛嘉烈医院，多伦多，安大略省。

sentences.english: He was mine manager of the Kirkland Lake Gold Mine in northern Ontario for many years.
sentences.chinese: 他是安大略省北部的柯克兰莱克金矿的矿长。

sentences.english: Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan owns 10,7% of company shares.
sentences.chinese: 安大略教师退休金计划拥有10个，7%的公司股票。

sentences.english: We’re going to see your mother, in Toronto, Ontario.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去安大略湖的多伦多看你的妈妈。

sentences.english: As a result, the Ontario Lottery continued to sell scratch tickets with baited hooks.
sentences.chinese: 最后，安大略博彩继续出售具有诱饵的刮彩。
安大略的天体物理学家，也同意这个观点。

sentences.english: His rare gifts and bold strategy are universally acknowledged.
sentences.chinese: 他的雄才大略是举世公认的。

sentences.english: Our textbook only skims the surface of the Vietnam War.
sentences.chinese: 我们的教科书只大略地带过越南战争。

sentences.english: Historic Ontario Towns - Timmins. Copy photo of Third Avenue.
sentences.chinese: 历史上的加拿大安大略湖小镇蒂明斯，第三大街。

sentences.english: This Ontario Ranger knife is the Spec Plus Gen II.
sentences.chinese: 这安大略游侠加刀是第二代规格。

definition: to be abbreviated to/(followed by a verb) slightly
to deduce/to infer/an implication/same as 推演
pros and cons/advantages and disadvantages/gains and losses
to be well aware of sth/to understand clearly
see 了如指掌[liao3 ru2 zhi3 zhang3]
see 了如指掌[liao3 ru2 zhi3 zhang3]
the rise and fall of the terrain (idiom)/(fig.) the whole sequence of events/causes and effects
